STATUS_EFFECT_DEATH_MARK STATUS_EFFECT_DEATH_MARK
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BATTLE_CRY Battle Cry ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BATTLE_CRY_DESCRIPTION Increase your army morale! ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BATTLE_CRY_DESCRIPTION_LVL1 +5 morale for 1 turn. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BATTLE_CRY_DESCRIPTION_LVL2 +10 morale and -5 morale to your enemies for 3 turns. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BATTLE_CRY_DESCRIPTION_LVL3 +15 morale and -10 morale to your enemies for 4 turns.
STATUS_EFFECT_BATTLE_CRY_1 STATUS_EFFECT_BATTLE_CRY_1 STATUS_EFFECT_BATTLE_CRY_2 STATUS_EFFECT_BATTLE_CRY_2 STATUS_EFFECT_BATTLE_CRY_3 STATUS_EFFECT_BATTLE_CRY_3
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_RESOURCES Show Resources ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_RESOURCES_DESCRIPTION Immediately discovers resources in the area around the commander. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_RESOURCES_DESCRIPTION_LVL1 Discovers basic resources. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_RESOURCES_DESCRIPTION_LVL2 Discovers all resources. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_RESOURCES_DESCRIPTION_LVL3 Discovers all resources and fusion cores.
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_TREASURES Show Treasures ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_TREASURES_DESCRIPTION Immediately discovers valuable items in the area around the commander. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_TREASURES_DESCRIPTION_LVL1 Discovers chests. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_TREASURES_DESCRIPTION_LVL2 Discovers chests and equipment. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_SHOW_TREASURES_DESCRIPTION_LVL3 Discovers chests, equipment and artifacts.
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BARBARIAN_HORDE Barbarian Horde ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BARBARIAN_HORDE_DESCRIPTION Appear as your strongest commander! ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BARBARIAN_HORDE_DESCRIPTION_LVL2 Forces enemies to question whether to attack. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_BARBARIAN_HORDE_DESCRIPTION_LVL3 Also fools the Scout skill.
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EASY_PREY Easy Prey ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EASY_PREY_DESCRIPTION Appear as your weakest commander! ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EASY_PREY_DESCRIPTION_LVL2 Pretend to be weak to trick others to attack you! ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EASY_PREY_DESCRIPTION_LVL3 Also fools the Scout skill.
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_INVISIBILITY Invisibility ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_INVISIBILITY_DESCRIPTION Makes the commander invisible to enemies until somebody approaches too closely. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_INVISIBILITY_DESCRIPTION_LVL2 Invisible until 4 tiles from enemy commanders. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_INVISIBILITY_DESCRIPTION_LVL3 Invisible until 2 tiles from enemy commanders.
STATUS_EFFECT_INVISIBILITY_2 STATUS_EFFECT_INVISIBILITY_2 STATUS_EFFECT_INVISIBILITY_3 STATUS_EFFECT_INVISIBILITY_3
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_PROTECTIVE_FIELD Protective Field ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_PROTECTIVE_FIELD_DESCRIPTION Casts a protective field that prevents negative effects from visited objects and from abilities. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_PROTECTIVE_FIELD_DESCRIPTION_LVL2 Protects the commander. ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_PROTECTIVE_FIELD_DESCRIPTION_LVL3 Protects commanders within a 2 tile range from the caster.
STATUS_EFFECT_PROTECTIVE_FIELD STATUS_EFFECT_PROTECTIVE_FIELD
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_REINFORCEMENT Reinforce! ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_REINFORCEMENT_DESCRIPTION Summon units of a specific type available at your bases directly to this commander's army.
DIALOG_ABILITY_REINFORCEMENT Summon Reinforcements! $1$2$4
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EAGLE_EYE Eagle Eye ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EAGLE_EYE_DESCRIPTION Doubles commander's vision range for one phase.
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_TOXIC_CLOUD Supercharged Cloud ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_TOXIC_CLOUD_DESCRIPTION Place an artificial cloud on the map. If a commander enters, they will lose movement and their army gets damaged in the next combat.
$1$2$4 $1$2$4 $1$2$4
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EVACUATION Evacuation ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_EVACUATION_DESCRIPTION Teleports the commander and their army to the nearest base.
ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_MIMIC Mimic ABILITY_HERO_EXPLORATION_MIMIC_DESCRIPTION Call an autonomous holographic friend so you can appear in multiple places at once. Don't let it touch anything!
HERO_MIMIC I'm a mimic!
